thread.section_title: Four Seasons Hotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Unparalleled Experience !
thread.title_full: Unparalleled Experience ! - Review of Four Seasons Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: SuMingChuah
title: Unparalleled Experience !
text:
Helpful staff at your beck and call
Impeccable customer service in arranging customised tours and also recommending places to go
Gastronomic Delight at their outlets especially the Italian restaurant. The chef was really passionate and customised a vegetarian menu for me upon request.
I have stayed in many 5 star hotels before but the staff service level is impeccable which reflects the great management at the hotel.
What more can a girl ask for when traveling alone in a foreign land. Will definitely be back! Thank you for such a wonderful experience. Also, shoutout to the General Manager whom I met ... he was very helpful with his advice on getting to know Beijing
